name: The Gripping Tales of Charlie Chainberlain
name_original: The Gripping Tales of Charlie Chainberlain
description:
Charlie Chainberlain is a master of chains, being able to summon them on almost any surface at free will. Join him on his adventures as he battles with creepy eye monsters in a small dungeon in order to retrieve his precious beloved.

Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

The Team:

  • Stephen Limcangco
  • Maximilian Yi Cao
  • Andy Lang

Assets used:

  • 2D Pixel Top-Down Dungeon Tileset - Matthias Stuetzer 
  • Unique Projectiles Vol. 2 - Gabriel Aguiar Prod 
  • (Free) Retro SFX Pack - 3rd Note Inc. 
  • 8Bit Music Album - 051321 - GWriterStudio 
  • Classic Footstep SFX - Matthew Anett
  • Free music and SFX collection - Alchemy Studio Music 
  • Shapeforms Audio Free Sound Effects - Shapeforms
